alert.note: Alert for Grant (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 16 at 9:28PM CDT until further notice by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota...Wisconsin...Iowa... Mississippi River at La Crosse affecting Houston, La Crosse and Vernon Counties. Mississippi River at Guttenberg Dam 10 affecting Grant and Clayton Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota...Wisconsin...Iowa... Mississippi River at Winona affecting Winona, Trempealeau and Buffalo Counties. Mississippi River at Lake City affecting Pepin, Wabasha and Goodhue Counties. Mississippi River at Wabasha affecting Wabasha and Buffalo Counties. Mississippi River at McGregor affecting Grant, Allamakee, Clayton and Crawford Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Guttenberg Dam 10. * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 14.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Tuesday afternoon and continue rising to 18.3 feet Sunday evening. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 18.2 feet on 04/10/1986. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued Monday morning.
